title: Bronze chandelier from the mosque of al Sultan Hasan
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Musée Arabe. Salle No. 7.  Lustre en bronze à six étages. Provenant de la mosquée du Sultan Kansou el-Ghouri. Fait en 909 de l'hég. (1503 J.C.). Translation of photographer's description: Arab museum. Hall No. 7 Bronze chandelier of six levels from the mosque of Sultan al-Ghouri Qansua. Manufactured in 909 A.H. (1503 A.D.).
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Bronze chandelier from the mosque of al Sultan Hasan
